evidence.claim: Care360 Hospice utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of health data.
Care360 Hospice supports healthcare standards such as HL7 and FHIR for interoperability.
EDI transaction sets are mentioned as part of their data exchange capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: Company focuses on hospice care; no clear evidence of X12 or EDI use.
